attributes.action: Withdraw all benefits for those who preach racial or religious hatered
attributes.additional_details: After the horrific and senseless murder  of Drummer Lee Rigby by Islamic extremists it is beyond believe and an insult to those of all colors and faiths that those who would advocate or condone violence towards the United Kingdom its citizens and armed forces should be allowed to claim social security benefits and social housing at the tax payers expense, This petition calls on the United Kingdom government to withdraw such benefits from such persons
